title: Rich Americans Face Biden Tax Hike With Anger, Denial, Grief
itunes:title: Rich Americans Face Biden Tax Hike With Anger, Denial, Grief
description:
Ian Lustbader, Clinical Professor of Medicine at NYU Langone, discusses the possibility of Covid leading to a humanitarian crisis in India. Businessweek Editor Joel Weber provides an overview of the new double issue of Bloomberg Businessweek Magazine. Bloomberg News Finance Reporter Max Abelson explains why investors are irked by President Biden's plan for a capital gains tax of up to 43.4%. And we Drive to the Close with Eric Clark, Portfolio Manager at Rational Dynamic Brands Fund.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
